stretches.name: Hip Bridges
stretches.description: Basic / This exercise targets the hip extensors or glute group by lifting the hips off the ground.

stretches.name: Side-Lying Abduction
stretches.description: Basic / This focuses on strengthening the hip abductors by lifting the top leg sideways.

stretches.name: Straight Leg Raises
stretches.description: Basic / This exercise strengthens the hip flexors by raising a straight leg towards the ceiling.

stretches.name: Hip Extension (4-Way)
stretches.description: Intermediate / This exercise involves pulling the leg straight back using a resistance band, targeting the glutes.

stretches.name: Hip Abduction (4-Way)
stretches.description: Intermediate / This involves pulling the leg out to the side, away from the body, using a resistance band.

stretches.name: Hip Flexion (4-Way)
stretches.description: Intermediate / This exercise involves pulling the leg forward using a resistance band, targeting the hip flexors.

stretches.name: Hip Adduction (4-Way)
stretches.description: Intermediate / This involves pulling the leg across the body using a resistance band, targeting the inner thigh muscles.

stretches.name: Deadlift
stretches.description: Advanced / This is a functional movement focusing on hinging at the hips to lift weight, engaging powerful hip muscles.

stretches.name: Squat
stretches.description: Advanced / This is a fundamental movement pattern involving bending at the hips and knees to lower the body.
